item.title: The ugly truth behind food waste
item.author: Sarah Kakadellis,
item.description: There is no way of denying it: we overproduce. Constantly. We throw. Shamelessly. We waste. Consciously. Every day, tonnes of food are thrown away simply because some food legislation has put a standardized limit ‘eat before’ date or due to surplus. Worse, because we buy more than we really need. …

item.title: Seeding the Veggie Power
item.author: Sarah Kakadellis,
item.description: The foodies, meat lovers or simply punctilious readers amongst you may remember last week’s article raising arguments for meat consumption, or rather, for not feeling guilty about it as long as you accepted the responsibilities. And I thought there would be nothing better than hunting my friend’s …
